text: Whomever God sends astray he has no guide. And He leaves them read in the imperfect indicative wa-yadharuhum or wa-nadharuhum ‘and We leave them’ as the beginning of a new sentence; or the same verbs in the imperfect jussive apocopated form wa-yadharhum or wa-nadharhum as a supplement to what comes after fā’ of fa-lā hādiya lahu ‘so he has no guide’ in their insolence to wander on blindly hesitating out of perplexity.
